entities.name: department of mysteries
entities.description: The Department of Mysteries is mentioned as a location where Harry and others are trying to find their way.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is the main character who is leading the group through the Department of Mysteries. He is described as pushing open a door and raising his wand.

entities.name: wizengamot
entities.description: The Wizengamot is an organization that tried Harry in the past, and its courtroom is mentioned as similar to the current location.

relationships.description: Harry is visiting the Department of Mysteries, trying to find his way through it.
Harry was tried by the Wizengamot in the past, and its courtroom is mentioned as similar to the current location.
